description: a(n) = n-th sept-factorial number divided by 6.
links: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..339
Index entries for sequences related to factorial numbers
mathematica: s=1;lst={s};Do[s+=n*s;AppendTo[lst, s], {n, 12, 5!, 7}];lst (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Nov 08 2008 *)FoldList[Times,1,Rest[7*Range[20]-1]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Dec 15 2014 *)
